text: Hamba munhu yumwe wa Nguluwi nakamhejelela mndewa wa Isilaeli, nakamlonjela, “Mkulu Nguluwi kangulonga hino, ‘Kwa vila Waalamu wangijesa heni Mkulu Nguluwi nda Nguluwi wa kuli vidunda na siwele Nguluwi wa kuli ibalalika, ndokudita usumye hali chilundo achi chikulu cha wamizi, nagwe kovizela kota heni ndo Mkulu Nguluwi.’ ”
